item.title: #2444 Flashes Of Quincy-dence
item.description: Luke says he can soooooorrrrrt of identify with a jogger who did a bad, bad thing this week. Andrew is freaked out about a new report on sponges (which he thinks might have been funded by Big Sponge.) And, since it's Friday, we have some Music For Your Weekend!
item.itunes:summary: Luke says he can soooooorrrrrt of identify with a jogger who did a bad, bad thing this week. Andrew is freaked out about a new report on sponges (which he thinks might have been funded by Big Sponge.) And, since it's Friday, we have some Music For Your Weekend!
item.itunes:author: Luke Burbank & Andrew Walsh
